meanings.definition: Containing, discharging, or causing the production of pus.
meanings.sent1: The purulent wound needed immediate attention from the doctor.
meanings.sent2: The infected cut became purulent and required antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The purulent pimple on his face made him look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The purulent corruption in the system needed to be cleaned out.
meanings.sent5: The purulent discharge from the wound was a sign of infection.

meanings.sent1: The purulent abscess was painful and swollen.
meanings.sent2: The purulent sore needed to be drained by the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The purulent mess in the fridge was a result of forgetting leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The purulent relationship between the two countries led to conflict.
meanings.sent5: The purulent wound oozed yellow pus, indicating an infection.

meanings.sent1: The purulent discharge had a foul smell.
meanings.sent2: The purulent substance was a clear sign of infection.
meanings.sent3: The purulent mess in the kitchen needed to be cleaned up.
meanings.sent4: The purulent atmosphere in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The purulent appearance of the wound alarmed the nurse.
